content: want to support my work buy me a coffee https //ko-fi com/karlijnscorner level beginner/intermediate materials 75-350 grams of #2-4 weight yarn 1 or multiple colours 3-4 mm hook darning needle measuring tape scissors stitch markers optional abbreviations us single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain st stitch yo yarn over fdc foundation double_crochet pattern notes this pattern consists of two cups a waistband and straps this pattern is made to measure this pattern comes with a tester lookbook feel free to refer for inspiration yarn usage and more included instructions slip knot foundation chain single_crochet double_crochet increase colour changes
